message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $180. It's a small compromise for a valuable item.

I'm still not sure $180 is a good deal for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I think that's a fair price for this product.
